title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.23 - Discontinuance of operation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 442.23 - Discontinuance of operation

State Regulations

The operation of a child-care institution may not be
discontinued unless the agency has served written notice of the proposed
discontinuance on the department at least 90 days prior to the proposed closing
date. The notice must comply with the requirements of section
476.2
(d) of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
442.23

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
